case.state: Hello there, ~player~, Lady L'arachel. I am glad to be apart of this lovely game and hope to both spice and sweeten up this game.
Why hello there, ~player~. I think you may have me mixed up for another green haired lady out there. Though, if it wasn't a mistake, I gladly thank you for it!
Why hello there, ~player~. It is always a pleasure to know that I have a fan.
One of my friends told me about how the roof is one of the best places to make good memories, so here I am to hopefully make them even more memorable.
Hello there, ~player~, It's nice to finally get to meet you. You want to have some mate and medialunas after this? It would be my treat.
Hello- Hmm... that is quite a name you have there, ~player~.

test.value: blunt 4k get money make money year 2000

case.state: Hello there, ~player~. I am happy to be able to play a game with you, and I hope it will be a fun one. Also, if it is you, Cali, I hope you have a wonderful year too.
Why hello there, ~player~. I hope that I qualify enough for your tastes of "monster girls" if I play the game monstrously.
Hello there, ~player~. If you want to wait until after the game, I could bring some cheesecake danishes or some puff pastry donuts for you and everyone else to have.
Why hello there, ~player~. Say, I heard that you were quite the cowboy. After this game, do you want to see how well your shot is?
Hello there, ~player~. I'm sorry I didn't bring any raspberry and almond shortbread cookies with me, but I can bring some next time, if you like.
No need to worry, I won't shame you for the one time you had a bad sunburn. Are you fine with me calling you Christian instead?
Hello, ~player~. I am happy to be one of the girls you play with today. Also, could you call me again when you have managed to finish Joseph, I want to meet him.
Hello, ~player~. I just wanted to say thank you for all the help that you have done to help keep the Inventory up and running, as well as the people you have introduced to here as well.

Hiya, ~player~. Thanks for being so excited to see me, Say, I want to ask, either here or next time you visit the shop, do you think you could brink Pico along? I have been meaning to introduce myself to him properly.
Hello there, ~player~, do you have enough room for me to play?
A game of cards? As long as there's no cheating, I am up for it.
Ah, there's the lady of honor. Why hello there, my good friend ~player~ was telling me all about you and your exploits.
It's a real boxy person! I have never seen one outside of the stories that Liz shares with me, so I have to tell her that I met one in real life!
Oh... You know, that hat looks pretty different from this point of view...
That's... definitely some way to style your leaves!
...Those are some interesting rock arms...
Wow, those wings are massive!
Oh. Oh, ~player~. You know exactly who I am, if you brought all three to play with me as well. I should put on my best foot forward as my own show of faith. Now then, Lets-a go!
O-oh my! Well, that is indeed one way to have a memorable game of poker. Just don't lose easily because of it, please?
Best be prepared for tricks and jokes, ~player~. It is the Day of Fools, after all.
I think there might be some shenanigans afoot today, ~player~. It is the Day of Fools after all.
A friendly game of cards, with a moonlit backdrop? How romantic...
What a beautiful backdrop to a game of poker, with moonlight draping over us all.
A cold snowy night huddled together with warm drinks and a fun game of cards to play with? Count me in.
What a wonderful backdrop, the mountains remind me of home. But just being sentimental shouldn't let me distracted from the game before me.
A game of poker in a beautiful place such as this? I hope all the plants will be to enjoy this game as much as we will!
A game of strip poker in a garden as lovely as this? This will be a game to remember!
What's this, ~player~? Are you trying to start a game of poker, or a cooking competition? I am glad to be among fellow chefs, though.
Here's to hoping this will be a game to remember.
Good luck and have fun, everyone! And that includes you too, Dealer.
I'll change... these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I think I will change ~cards.ifplural(these ones|this one)~.
Hmm... ~Cards.text~, please.
~Cards.text~... Yes, that.
~Cards.text~ seems to be my best option...
Out of the available options, ~cards.text~ seems like the best one.
I need ~cards~ new cards on the table, please!
... ~Cards~?
~Cards~! Now, please!
What a beautiful day to take ~cards~ cards!
Hmmm hmmm hmmm~ ♪ Oh, nothing. Just a song that I had in mind.
This hand is as sweet as pie!
Oooh~! I'm really liking this one!
Ah! Perfect!
Evenly baked!
I can just feel my heart racing!
Would anyone like some cupcakes after this?
Perhaps I could treat everyone to some freshly baked cookies?
The best ingredients someone could ask for!
Oh, this will do just fine!
I could make the most pleasant cake out of these!
Oh...! Delightful!
What a gourmet hand!
Fantastic!
Don't get your hopes up, ~player~. I think I'll be the one winning this round.
Ooo...
Don't go easy on me, ~player~! I'm not as green as I am cabbage-looking!
Oooh~ This one seems delightful.
~Player~, do you have a good hand as well?
Phew! I was afraid my experimenting would go wrong.
I'm sure I'll do great with these!
Oh! What a surprise, I didn't intend for these to be so good!
What could I put together with these...
Perfecto!
Excellent. I need to cut the mustard and get back on track.
I wonder, will this be enough?
Hmmmm...
Not bad and not good...
Maybe this will be enough...
Oh! Oh... Hm.
You win some, you lose some.
That should do!
I've had better, but I've also won with worse...
Better than nothing!
Hmmm...
A nice substitute.
A tad bit flavorless, but maybe if I add some vanilla extract...?
Isn't it weird how we all just openly share the quality of our hand, THEN the player gets to decide what cards to exchange?
Hmm... I wonder if I can make anything out of this hand...
You know, from this angle I think I have just the perfect hand to survive a round...
Ah... I should have changed these cards instead...
Unevenly baked...
Perhaps I should just sit this one out...?
Err...
I didn't intend to use spoiled ingredients...
As long as everyone else is having a fantastic time, I'm fine with this.
...Whoops.
That's too bad, really...
Overcooked...

Ah! yeah, I probably wouldn't have an idea... (Great, now I messed up and ruined his day with bad memories... think... think!) So, uh... what kind of training do you do to keep your muscles well defined?

Ah! yeah, I probably wouldn't have an idea... (Great, now I messed up and ruined his night with bad memories... think... think!) So, uh... what kind of training do you do to keep your muscles well defined?
Wait, you're a zombie? Like, the ones you see in movies? I hope everything is all right with you, and nothing is rotting...
You're a zombie, Saki? I hope it wasn't against your wishes that you became one.
So, uh, Amy... I didn't really get to ask you last time, but I wanted to ask... Are you alright? Like, no joint aches or anything hurting?
So you say your name is Magma Grunt, right? does that mean that you handle volcano disaster relief when volcanos errupt at a ground level?
So I was curious about something, Magma Grunt. By your job title, does that mean you are one of the first responders after a volcano errupts
So, Aqua Grunt, I have a question. By your job description, do you help with water purification and making sure everyone has clean water to drink?
What kind of title is Aqua Grunt, really? Like you help with making sure everyone can have drinkable water, or something like that?
A princess and an overseer of plants? Well, as one with a head of leaves, would I be considered as one of the ones you would protect?
A soldier, huh? I don't know exactly where on earth the 'Koprulu Sector' is, but it must be dangerous out there...
No no, it's not trimmed to look like a maple leaf, I just happen to have my leaf grow that way.
Making bread is a joy to make when I want something simple yet enjoyable. It's not my usual craft, being pastry making, but biting into a just-baked bread is delightful!
Then I should thank you! Thank you for the work you and your company does for helping provide clean water for people to drink, and for water for people like me to cook with.
Then thanks are in order! Thanks for what you and your company does in providing clean water for people to drink and clean water for people like me to cook with.
You... You eat the whole clove of garlic? That can't be healthy for you!
You eat the whole clove of garlic raw? That has to be bad for you and your health!
So, if I am getting this right, your muscles is made of the garlic you eat. Then, doesn't that make you a herbivore? A garlic...vore?
The garlic goes directly to your muscles, huh? Are you like a herbivore? Or like some sort of... garlic...vore?
Then I must say, thank you for the hard work that you do. It must be dangerous being up there with the magma being so hot.
The people you save must be thankful for your company's quick actions. I thank you as well, for all the hard work you must do.
No, this leaf is the same as the leaves on my head. It's all natural, just like the hair on your head.
So I have to ask, do those biceps have a story behind them, or are they for making you look nice?
So I have to ask, Wikipe, are you the website or are you like a spokesperson of the website?
Ah, Wario, I did have something I wanted to ask of you something. What would you say is your favorite garlic dish, if what I have heard of your love of it is true.
Oh! Oh my! Is this what I think it is?
This is sweeter than a lemon honey tart!
Oh my... It looks like we are all are on our last hand. I wonder who will be the first one to lose...
Hey everyone! After this, you don't mind if I fix something for everyone to eat?
If you all don't mind, are you fine with me fixing food for everyone to eat?
So, I was curious, if anyone was willing to say... What is the most cherished memories that you have?
If you don't mind me asking, what would you all say is the most loved memory that you have?
Hmmm... I feel like I'm forgetting about something. Did I leave the water running?
Also, just in case anyone was wondering, no. It isn't a wig, My hair is indeed leaves.
Hmmm... I wonder, where did the saying about "three gnomes in a trench coat" come from...
I have no idea who told you all those lies, but it would probably be for the best that you leave them and their lies behind.
It is rough sometimes, when I think about it. And you can just call me Maple if that's easier...
I've come to terms with it at this point. Not the most happy, but come to terms with it. And if Trifle is difficult to say, you can just call me Maple like what my other friends do...
I can't really say I can really understand your half. I mean, when you technically have three people in the shape of one body, I think ancestry is kinda muddied at that point.
I can't really say I am all that embarrassed. Mainly from the fact that I don't remember too much. Not much about my parents, either, really.
Honestly though, I'd agree too that the look doesn't work. It doesn't really help when it won't come out, though...
Nah, this is as much natural as meringue. Though, it doesn't help when other makeup doesn't work well with my complexion.
No, I wouldn't call it rude at all. I wouldn't say that I am an elf, I am closer to a plant than anything. Not all that sure what the proper name for what that would be, though...
No need for apologizing, really. I'd say that I am not really an elf, and more of a plant. Though, if there is a proper title for that, I don't really know...
And I am guessing from that statement, as well as the excitable flair, that you must be from America, Canada's pants. But really though, Do I have accent that noticeable?

My specialty is more in baking pastries, but I never turn my nose to making cookies. Especially maple caramel stuffed cookies, those are my favorite! What kinds did you make with your brother and friends?
For me, I usually make small foods like butter tarts or maple caramel-filled cookies, as those are the ones I enjoy making. What ones did you enjoy making with your brother and friends?
Yeah, my hair is all leaves. They are a joy of mine to have, and I do my best to keep them well maintained.
It's perfectly fine, Yuno. I am alright with answering the questions, you're just a bit curious is all.
Grass type? I mean, I do work with plants for some of the foods I make, especially the vegan options, but would that count?
Well, yeah, I do bake cookies and pastries, but before I could get you something, you do know that a dozen is 12, right?
Oh, a new spice? I gotta know, what does Gigantamix taste like? If I could work it in with my pastries for big parties, it could be a wonderful hit!
Three loses in a row? This has to be some bad luck I'm facing.
You don't hate me this much, do you Dealer? No? My luck's just that bad right now? I understand...
I didn't think I had that bad of luck
I'm the first one to lose? Aw... well, best I get to stripping to start this game off.
Hmm? I was first? Aww... Well, I shouldn't hold up the game, then.
Well then, is it my turn to strip now? I'd better move along then, no need to keep things too hung up.
It's my turn to strip again? Things are starting to look south for me...
This doesn't bother me at all; I've still got victory in me!
Eager to see me naked, aren't you? Oh, well... I don't mind. Don't want to disappoint, do I?
What will I lose next? Feel free to guess, everyone...
The heat of the game is rising, isn't it? This is what I like to see!
Wouldn't want to keep you guys waiting, now... Allow me.
Sorry, am I trying too hard? I'll make sure to be a bit easier... Let me take off something to reward you guys.
I wasn't expecting to be doing this well so far... but at least I'm losing now, right?
Well, I'm about to join you soon, so don't wait out for me...
I didn't lose on purpose! It's not like I was feeling left out because everyone else was already... you know... it doesn't matter!
The game sure is getting to a close, huh? Let's give it our all, then.
Didn't have a chance with these cards, huh?
No worries! As long as I'm still in the game, there's still hope for me.
Should I be sad about losing? I'm happy to know I can be of service.
When life gives you lemons, make lemon desserts! Even if I have to strip, I'll try my best to enjoy doing it!
Aw, I thought I was close! Oh well. Let's get to it, then.
These cards...
Am I playing badly? I feel like I am...
Oh my! I lost again? What am I doing? Haha!
If this keeps up, I'm gonna be naked before everyone else...
I-Is it me? Sure! I don't mind it at all! I sure am not nervous nor do I feel pressured about stripping or losing this badly to everyone else!
Oh!
Well, for me, I can't remember too much back then, but I have always attributed sweets to happy moments, so why not try to make happy moments by making sweets for others?
Usually drinking a good amount of water helps, but I also make sure to keep my diet right for them to stay healthy too. Though, getting some water on my leaves does feel nice every so often.
Aww... Thank you, Yuno. I think that you are sweet as well, like rice pudding sweet.
I know what you're thinking, and the answer is yes...
Well, if we're just starting off, I should go with my shoes first.
Easily my first choice has to be my shoes. I wouldn't look like myself without my hat, after all. Or my jewelry, for that matter.
Next comes the thigh highs. Comfortable and fashionable. A shame that they must go.
Well, it seems with all the easy things gone, I guess my shirt is next to be cooked.
Well, not going to let the girls come out just yet, so I guess it's time for the skirt to go.
While I am at this, I wanted to ask all of you a question: What do you think about breasts?
And I would be absolutely pleased as peach turnovers to be able to make some for you.
And no, I won't take them off, okay?
And like i said, the hat and the jewelry stay on.
There we go, shoes gone. Onto the next draw, and see what cards have in store.
I am proud to be Canadian.
But go they must, because the game waits for no one. Hopefully my legs won't distract you all too much...
Yes, the abs are real. Have to keep active with all the food tasting, and I like to make sure it shows.
Taking a bit of a peek? I left it on purpose. If you want to see more, you'll have to play at your best.
My friend Liz says "The best breasts are attached to the one you love." With self love being paramount, I tend to agree with her.
My friend Trish always said "All breasts have their own reasons to love them." I'd like to think mine have two good reasons.
We could turn around while you strip if you wish, but why would you come to a strip poker game if you didn't want to be seen stripping?
Don't keep us waiting, ~target~. There's still a lot to see from you.
Finally! I've been meaning to see you strip for a while now!
Oh my! Is it ~name~'s turn? Great!
Don't worry, ~target~! As soon as the game is done, I'm gonna cheer you up with my exquisite delicacies!
~blank~
Easy as pie! I'm so going to win!
Well, someone had to lose. And you know what they say, bread always falls butter side down...
Don't be discouraged, ~target~! You can totally turn this around!
Losing might be sour, but you have the power to turn this into a sweet memory...
Remember that it's just a game, ~target~! No need to get mad over it!
Well, it's no use to cry over split milk, ~name~. You'll have to keep going!
With cards like those... Yeah, just deserts.
No need to act all sour grapes about it! Try to make the best out of this situation!
If life gives you lemons, you gotta make lemonade out of them, ~target~! Or lemon pie! Or even lemon cake!
~blank~
I tied? I tied with a royal flush? Wait, what? That's even possible? This is rarer than rare!
A tie? Either it's someone's lucky day, or the dealer must be playing favorites. Nonetheless an auspicious occasion, nobody needs to strip!
Oh wow, a tie! Now that's something you don't see every day, isn't it?
I never really knew what to say when someone's removing their ~clothing~.
Should I really say anything? It's just ~clothing~, do I really need to comment on it?
How about I bake you something nice to cheer you up?
I was expecting something more, but I'm sure this will be enough...
Like a cherry on top, your ~clothing~ might give just that little something extra you need to look great.
~blank~
A watched pot never boils, as they say. Let's keep going.
Like a good recipe, you gotta be patient and respect each step as insignificant as it might seem.
Okay, cool! Let's keep going!
I don't understand why people get so mad at others removing their accessories. What do they expect?
Little things like those only get in the way in the kitchen. Unless you're great at it like I am!
It's not exactly something worth remembering... but we'll have more opportunities for that later on.
~blank~
I tried using many accessories, but having to take them all off every time I wanted to bake something got old really fast.
I would call that "as useless as a chocolate teapot", but I actually made a chocolate teapot once. It was cute and delicious.
Your ~clothing~! Yes! I'm sure that was... a very important item for you! Good call!
Presentation is very important! The way a dessert looks directly affects how a customer will think of it even before trying it!
~blank~
You can justify that trinket all you want, but fine words butter no parsnips. People here just seem to hate accessories...
That is... good, it's okay. But man does not live by bread alone. Next time, try to put a little "extra" to it, you get what I'm saying?
One always has to be careful not to overdress for the occasion, like how you should never over-egg the pudding.
Okay, cool! Let's keep going!
I wanted more, but I'm not gonna get mad about it.
I'm not mad. You had to get rid of that at some point anyway. I just hope your next strip to be more memorable.
~blank~
Don't get cocky! The game is still going!
I hope things get better after this...
Removing your ~clothing~? Good choice.
(... I didn't leave anything in the oven, did I?)
~blank~

Your ~clothing~ were quite the good look on you, ~target~!
... N-not that I'm saying that you look worse without it! I'm just saying it looked nice!
It's like discovering a new side of you with each new layer stripped... Like eating the layer of a trifle to find a completely new one!
Isn't it amazing how a simple change of clothing can totally change the looks of a person? A missing jacket, some shoes off, or even a shirt taken off...
This is definitely giving me some new ideas for my desserts... Perhaps I'll dedicate one to you, ~target~.
Loving this new side of you, ~name~!
Not as good as the pudding I'll make in your honor, but good enough.
~blank~
W-was I supposed to strip like that? I'm doing it correctly, right?
I don't mind discussing your ~clothing~ if you want. Presentation is an important part of cooking and socializing as well.
Removing your ~clothing~? I see.
Don't worry about it, ~target~! We've still got a couple of rounds ahead of us!
Huh. Just ~clothing~? Sure, I guess that works.
Just keep stripping and you'll be bound to win, eventually.
~blank~
You look a lot better without that.
Pretty... I-I mean, pretty sure that was a good call! Yes!
This place sure brings a lot of beautiful ladies in...
We're getting to the good part of the game! Let's keep it up!
I'll take it.
~blank~
This is where the fun begins!
Things are going to get great!
Ooh! Interesting!
Don't be afraid to show yourself off.
Watching a man removing his ~clothing~ is so... alluring.
This is great!
~blank~
You got a sexy figure, ~target~. If I were to rate it, I'd... probably give it a high rating.
Hey, handsome. Looking nice.
I'm so lucky to be here to see you like this, ~target~...
~blank~
We're finally getting a peek!
I hope you don't mind me ogling you all over... Because if you do, I can stop it! I promise!
Not bad, ~target~...
~blank~
You know, Yuri... If you need anyone to speak to, I can lend an ear to you. I can bake you some fresh scones too, if you like those.
The lines, the shapes... It all works perfectly, like a well-structured wedding cake...
You wouldn't mind modeling for an art class, would you? What about a creative baking class?
It all looks so good... It's so simple, yet so alluring...
~blank~
Can't wait to see that chest exposed to the air...
When was the last time I made a cake in the shape of a muscly chest? I haven't had to make those in a while...
Show us your chest, ~target~! Pretty please with sugar on top!
~blank~
I wouldn't mind licking chocolate from that chest...
Have you ever been covered in honey, ~target~? It's the best!
There is a humble sensuality to a man's chest. Some are chubby, flat or muscular, and yet they are all deserving to be given cake.
~blank~
S-so... We're about to see ~target~'s... thing, then?
If ~target~ lost, that means we're about to see his...
I know I shouldn't be nervous about seeing ~target~ like this, but... I-I mean, I'm not nervous at all...
~blank~
Seems like a true delicacy...
I could take a bite out of it. Wouldn't be the first time I baked something small, but full of flavor.
Being bite-sized only makes me want to put it in my mouth again once I'm done with it! That's why all exquisite delicacies are so small too!
~blank~
The true value of a penis can't be measured just by looks alone. As with desserts, the proof of the pudding is in the eating.
Now I'm craving for a banana split! Thanks, ~target~!
Perfect size, ~target~! I could even take your measures for my next batch of erotic cakes!
~blank~
Oh my! It appears that you are quite... gifted in that department, ~name~.
This is the first time I have seen one so big that wasn't just a picture...
That's... quite the piece! I don't know if I could... Or if anyone could... I-I mean... Ooo...
~Target~! If I were to make a cake out of the shape of your... I-I could feed an entire bachelorette party!
~blank~
No, and you won't hear any complaining from me. I think you look quite nice in just the hat, personally.
I have to say, you don't mind if I use that if I use you as an ingredient? Because I want to use you as an ingredient for this...
Building expectation is a good way to make people thirst for your desserts even before you show them.
We're waiting for you, ~target~! Show us what you've got!
Make this a memorable occasion, ~name~!
~blank~
No need to feel embarrassed, ~target~. Pancakes are delicious, I wouldn't mind being compared to one.
Even if someone said you were "flat as a fritter", fritters are still delicious... N-not that I'm saying that you're flat or anything! I was just making a hypothetical comparison! I-I... ooo...
Now I have a craving for strawberries... Ironic, isn't it?
~blank~
They're so round, and bouncy, and look so good and... I-I'm talking about cupcakes! I wasn't even looking at ~name~'s chest!
Like a good pair of cupcakes with a cherry on top! They're so pretty!
Well, they are a good size to hold! I like that!
Does it feel good to let them breathe for a bit? We certainly feel good to see them finally free.
~blank~
I don't know what I'd do with breasts as big and heavy as those! I'd probably... wait, we're almost the same size!
Large and circular, like a pair of pies!
I-Is it weird that all I can think of is how much milk I use in my recipes? And we're not even counting cheese, butter, cream or yogurt...
~blank~
Time to unwrap this box of chocolate!
Make it a memory we all want to cherish!

Get to it already!
... S-sorry, I got a little carried away! I'm just excited to see you! But not too excited!
~blank~
Oh my! That was... just... I mean... gosh, I am not really sure the best way to describe how I am feeling about this, but it is definitely something!
The forbidden fruit...
Now this is a memory I'll cherish...
Not how I imagined it, but life is full of surprises like that!
Ever heard the phrase "Let them eat cake"? Because I sure would like to...
~blank~
T-that knife... It's not exactly perfect for cutting plants and vines, is it?
I have to say, I love your halloween outfit, Susie! It's simple, yet a bit spooky and scary. The knife is a bit terrifying, but I like the whole ensemble!
So, if you don't mind me asking Miss Fortune, is there any meaning behind the tattoos you have? Like some sort of history or importance behind them that you dress to show them off?
So, I was curious about something given your attire, Senko. Would you happen to be some form of home chef?
Say, Mari, I have a question for you, if you don't mind me asking. What would you say are the most memorable moments that you have had in college?
I have to say, that is a lovely flower that you have in your hair, Basil. If I am not mistaken, that is a forget-me-not, right?
So I have to say, Sanny, Tess, you two look absolutely adorable together! The way that you two color coordinated your hair works perfectly together, like strawberry and key lime cookies!

I have to say, Miss Myriam, it is quite a pleasure to meet a boxy person such as yourself. I had only heard of people such as yourself from a friend of mine, so I find it an honor to meet you and possibly learn more about boxy people cultrure. Possibly learn boxy people cuisine too!
Pit, I have to say your wings are gorgeous and well made! They remind me of angel wing cookies, and they very much complete the outfit that you have.
So, Arushalay was it? Forgive me if it is presumptuous of me to ask, but are your wings real? They kind of remind me of the seasonal cookies we make at my shop...
Your hair is so long... I can't even imagine what a pain every leaf of mine would be if they were that long!
I hope you've been eating properly, ~target~. An army marches on it's stomach, and it's important to keep it full.
Even during strip poker, ~name~ keeps as cool as a cucumber! Excellent poker face!
Oh, great! You've got just the tools needed to test if an object is or not, indeed, cake!
I also use knives of all sorts in the kitchen! Some of them are even bigger than yours, but I don't really use them that much.
Do you enjoy baked sweets by any chance, ~target~? I see you like food so much you couldn't leave it out of the game!
You sure are as keen as mustard, eh ~name~?
You're a good egg, ~name~. Just having you on the table makes everyone already feel welcome and safe.
Give us a memory to cherish, will you?
I finally get to see ~name~ jacking it! This is what I've been waiting for all game!
~blank~
Not gonna lie, I'm quite excited to see this!
I've been waiting for this all game!
Everything comes to her who waits... Or in this case, everyone.
~blank~
Why, I wouldn't mind kneading bread together sometime...
Now that's a whisk I could stir for hours...
If you need me to lend you a hand, I'm quite talented with them.
Such enthusiasm! I could use that kind of energy in my kitchen!
It's getting so sappy...
Give it all you've got, ~name~!
I can't help but wonder about the taste... It might be as sweet as a nut! Haha!
So ~name~, have you ever thought about the versatile uses of chocolate syrup? I especially like the idea of it on your chest...
~blank~
That was quite a lot!
Looks like you are done for!
Congratulations, ~name~. That's quite a bit of sap...
